entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
